entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 11.

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:55 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
